B. 2 percent

C. 1.5 percent

D. 0.1 percent

E. 0.2 percent

F. 0.3 percent

G. 0.5 percent

H. 5 percent

I. 0.02 percent

J. 0.05 percent

Answer with only a single letter. Answer:<|im_end|>
